thought: I need to access the URL to obtain the status code and then extract the text and hyperlinks from the HTML to analyze the content.
observation: Navigating to https://harbourinv.com/ returned status code 200

thought: The website is accessible, now I need to extract the text and hyperlinks to analyze the content.
observation: Harbour Investments - Independent Midwest Broker Dealer | Madison, WI  Home Prospective Advisor Why Harbour? Testimonials Video Testimonials Products & Services Commissions & Payouts Business Resource Tools Join Us Clients Regulation BI Your Financial Professional How We Work Disclosures Definitions Helpful Links About Our History Charitable Initiatives News Harbour In the News Events and Highlights Harbour News Archive Contact Advisor Login Technology that is progressive and above the competition Learn More A hybrid firm with no platform fees "We were met with open arms and welcomed by all." - Scott B. Midwestern Values Learn About Us Previous Next Harbour Investments founded in 1987, in the beautiful city of Madison, Wisconsin Harbour could not be where we today without our advisors. We treat our advisors the way they treat their clients, with respect and dignity. We currently serve approximately 220 investment advisors located in 14 states. I am an Advisor I am a Client Why Choose Harbour? we believe in: Partnership We are a partner dedicated to advisors throughout their business lifecycle.  To do this we have to know our advisors well and strive to see them four times per year. Independence This is the advisor’s business.  Their culture and values should guide the journey, not the broker-dealer or RIA. Value We have fair payouts and keep expenses low.  No platform fees in our RIA helps keep client expenses lower. Learn More about Us ... November 21, 2023 See More Updates "Transitioning to Harbour Investments was as easy as humanly possible." The day of my resignation, I had a family emergency and had to leave town.  With the help of their transition team, I was still up and running faster than if I had done it myself.  After it was complete, I had only wished I would have done it 10 years ago.  Weekly commissions and literally being called my first name are only a few reasons why I consider myself at home. Neal Rohrs , Charlotte, MI; Joined Harbour in January, 2013 Read More Testimonials "I'm very happy to say that not only have they done everything they promised, they've done more." I've been in the business for 13 years and am only 36 years old and it's very comforting to know that this will be the last career move I make.  I feel like I've found a home with Harbour. Aaron Cade , Viroqua, WI; Joined Harbour in August, 2011 “Harbour is the best BD I've worked with large or small.” With 32 years in financial services, I've had at least eight Broker Dealers.  Harbour is the best BD I've worked with large or small.  Because of the help and guidance they've provided, they deserve some credit for the success I've had since joining them in 2001.  Even with the market tumult, these have been my highest earning years. Rita Wilczek , St Louis Park, MN; Joined Harbour in October, 2001 Locate A Representative contact us today to connect to your local representative! 575 D'Onofrio Drive Madison, WI 53719 (608) 662-6100 (888) 855-6960 info@harbourinv.com Follow Us on LinkedIn Careers Webmail Log In FINRA FINRA's BrokerCheck SIPC |

thought: The WHOIS information shows that the domain is registered and provides contact information. The website content also seems to be legitimate. Based on the characteristics of scam websites, it does not appear that https://harbourinv.com/ is a scam website. {

observation.reason: //harbourinv.com/ does not exhibit any of the characteristics of a scam website. The domain is registered and the content is consistent with a legitimate brokerage firm.
